alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clay and south central Duval Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace, or near Orange Park, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Nas Jax, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside, Normandy, Oakleaf Plantation, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace and Jacksonville Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
